# Service Template

The MiniSource service template provides a production-ready foundation for creating new microservices.

## Features

<Cards>
  <Card title="Go Fiber" icon="Zap">
    High-performance HTTP framework pre-configured
  </Card>
  <Card title="GORM" icon="Database">
    Database ORM with PostgreSQL support
  </Card>
  <Card title="gRPC" icon="Server">
    Service-to-service communication ready
  </Card>
  <Card title="Migrations" icon="GitBranch">
    Database migration setup included
  </Card>
  <Card title="Docker" icon="Box">
    Docker and docker-compose configuration
  </Card>
  <Card title="Makefile" icon="Terminal">
    Common development commands automated
  </Card>
</Cards>

## What's Included

- **Project Structure** - Organized directory layout
- **HTTP Server** - Fiber with middleware
- **gRPC Server** - Protobuf service definitions
- **Database** - PostgreSQL connection and migrations
- **Configuration** - Environment-based config
- **Logging** - Structured logging with context
- **Testing** - Unit and integration test setup
- **CI/CD** - GitHub Actions workflows
- **Documentation** - Swagger/OpenAPI specs

## Quick Start

See [Create New Service](/docs/template/create-service) for step-by-step instructions.

## Project Structure

```
my-service/
├── cmd/
│   ├── main.go          # Application entry point
│   └── migrate/         # Migration tool
├── internal/
│   ├── handler/         # HTTP handlers
│   ├── service/         # Business logic
│   ├── repository/      # Data access
│   └── models/          # Domain models
├── proto/               # Protobuf definitions
├── migrations/          # SQL migrations
├── config/              # Configuration
├── docker/              # Docker files
├── Makefile            # Build commands
└── README.md
```
